alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:17PM EDT until July 21 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Somerset County in west central Maine... Northeastern Franklin County in western Maine... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 517 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles north of Bingham, or 23 miles southeast of Jackman, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackman, Caratunk Plantation, Misery Gore, Sandwich Academy Grant, Carrying Place, Long Pond, Parlin Pond, Bald Mountain, Rockwood Strip, Chase Stream, Pierce Pond, Johnson Mountain, West Fork Plantation, Upper Enchanted, Taunton And Raynham Academy Grant, East Moxie, Sapling, Indian Stream, The Forks Plantation and Moxie Gore. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
